name: sticky-state
description: StickyState is a high performant module making native position:sticky statefull and polyfill the missing sticky browser feature

scripts.build-js: browserify --fast -e src/index.js -d --standalone StickyState -t babelify | derequire | exorcist dist/stickystate.browser.js.map > dist/stickystate.browser.js
scripts.dist-js: BABEL_ENV=production NODE_ENV=production browserify -e src/index.js --standalone StickyState -t babelify | derequire > dist/stickystate.browser.js
scripts.dist: cp src/stickystate.css dist/ && npm run dist-js && npm run dist-js-min && npm run build-lib
scripts.watch-js: watchify -d --poll=100 --fast --standalone StickyState -e src/index.js -t babelify -o 'exorcist dist/stickystate.browser.js.map > dist/stickystate.browser.js' -v
